name: CNContactPickerDelegate
desc: The methods that you implement to respond to contact-picker user events.

items.name: func contactPicker(CNContactPickerViewController, didSelect: CNContact)
items.desc: Called after a contact has been selected by the user.

items.name: func contactPicker(CNContactPickerViewController, didSelect: CNContactProperty)
items.desc: Called when a property of the contact has been selected by the user.

items.name: func contactPicker(CNContactPickerViewController, didSelect: [CNContact])
items.desc: Called after contacts have been selected by the user.

items.name: func contactPicker(CNContactPickerViewController, didSelectContactProperties: [CNContactProperty])
items.desc: Called after contact properties have been selected by the user.

items.name: func contactPickerDidCancel(CNContactPickerViewController)
items.desc: In iOS, called when the user taps Cancel.

items.name: func contactPickerWillClose(CNContactPicker)
items.desc: In macOS, called when the contact picker’s popover is about to close.

items.name: func contactPickerDidClose(CNContactPicker)
items.desc: In macOS, called when the contact picker’s popover has closed.
